name: Vanilluxe
description: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during hail, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.
abilities.description: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.effect: The weather changes to hail when this Pokémon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.  If multiple Pokémon with this ability, drizzle, drought, or sand stream are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting trick room.  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokémon will stay.
abilities.description: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.effect: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.  This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
